parameters.name: Datum1
parameters.description: Datum reference string 1

parameters.name: Datum2
parameters.description: Datum reference string 2

parameters.name: Datum3
parameters.description: Datum reference string 3

parameters.name: AreaStyle
parameters.description: 0 = point, 1 = circle, 2 = rectangle

parameters.name: AreaOutside
parameters.description: True to display target area dimensions size outside, false otherwise

parameters.name: Value1
parameters.description: Numeric datum target area diameter or width

parameters.name: Value2
parameters.description: Numeric datum target area height

parameters.name: ValueStr1
parameters.description: Value for datum target area diameter or width

parameters.name: ValueStr2
parameters.description: Value for datum target area height

parameters.name: ArrowsSmart
parameters.description: True if you want smart arrows, false otherwise

parameters.name: ArrowStyle
parameters.description: Arrow head style (for example, open, closed, and so on) as defined in swArrowStyle_e

parameters.name: LeaderLineStyle
parameters.description: Leaderline type as defined in swLeaderStyle_e

parameters.name: LeaderBent
parameters.description: True if you want a bent leader line, false otherwise

parameters.name: ShowArea
parameters.description: True if you want to show the target area, false otherwise

parameters.name: ShowSymbol
parameters.description: True if you want to display the target symbol, false otherwise
